popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on offensive and damaging powers
A mastery path focused on hindering and weakening foes

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.note: Only usable on Rams
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.note: Only usable on Siege Engines
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds.  You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

data.name: Gedup!
data.note:
Only usable on Dead Players
Builds Mork's Waaagh! & Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Resurrects your target with 20% health.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and resurrects your target with 50% health.

data.name: 'Ey, Quit Bleedin'
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Heals your target for 1520 health over 15 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Healing increased 45%.

data.name: Look Over There!
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 80% damage to you for 5 seconds. You will also deal 80% damage to them until the effect is broken.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 25 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description:
You deal 25% more damage, but your healing output is reduced by 20%.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Stop hittin' me!
data.description: Your chance to disrupt attacks is increased by 5%, and you Detaunt all enemies within 25 feet for 10 seconds, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Burst O' Waaagh!
data.description: When consuming 5 Gork's Waaagh! points, your Critical Damage and Critical Healing is increased by 50% for 5 seconds. When consuming 5 Mork's Waaagh! points, your Intelligence and Willpower is increased by 240 for 5 seconds.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 1200 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Gork Fix'd It
data.description: Your Gork'll Fix It is 15% more effective and will now restore 25 Action Points to the target.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Yer Not So Bad
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Steals 140 Action Points from your target over 7 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Additionally gives Action Points to your defensive target.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Additionally gives Action Points to group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Shrug It Off
data.note: Only usable on other players
data.description:
Bind yourself to one ally for 30 seconds, increasing your healing proficiency to them. All your healing abilities are 15% more effective on them.
This effect stacks with other sources that increase healing on the target.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Green Cleanin'
data.description: If Greener 'N Cleaner successfully removes an effect from an ally, then they will also regain 534 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds. This effect can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Eeeek!
data.description: You blast back all enemies within 20 feet of you, knocking them back a medium distance and snaring them by 30% for 5 seconds. Monsters will be knocked down by the blast.

data.name: Sacrificial Renewal
data.description: Whenever you critically heal an ally with a direct healing ability, you increase the power of your heals by 15% for 5 seconds, but you also take 10% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Extra Special Mushrooms
data.description: Increases your chance to critically heal by 10%.

data.name: Gork Sez Stop
data.description: Your target suffers 600 damage over 2s. If the target moves, the duration is restarted.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Dat Makes Me Dizzy
data.description: Your can now resurrect allies instantly, but you are stunned for 3 seconds after casting.

data.name: Breath of Mork
data.description: Heals your target for 801 health every 3 seconds over 9 seconds. Each pulse also heals those around the target within 25 feet.

data.name: Mork Is Watchin'
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit enemies by 10%.

data.name: Look At Dem!
data.description: You'z Squishy now deals 796 Elemental damage over 10 seconds to affected targets, but has its duration decreased by 10 seconds.

data.name: Git Outta Here!
data.description: Reduces Eeeek!'s cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: You Weren't Using Dat
data.description: Deals 900 damage and removes 100 Action Points from all enemies within 20 feet of your target, and gives 50% of the stolen Action Points to group mates within 100 feet.

data.name: Get Movin'!
data.description: Any time one of your groupmates damages an enemy with 'Ere We Go, they will gain 100 points of Morale.

data.name: Ain't Done Yet!
data.description: Your healing abilities become 40% more effective when the target is below 30% hit points.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Restores 1800 health to all group members within 100 feet and increases your outgoing healing by 35% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Gork'll Fix It
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Your target regains 309 health immediately then continues to gain another 370 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 45%.

data.name: Mork's Buffer
data.description: Increases all resistances of your group mates within 100 feet by 240 for 1 hour.

data.name: Bigger, Better, An' Greener
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Heals your target for 1125 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and your ally will deal an additional 112 Elemental damage each time they critically hit for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Greener 'n Cleaner
data.note:
Target must be Cursed or Ailing
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You cleanse an ally, removing one Curse or Ailment. If an effect is removed, your ally will absorb up to 262 damage over 10 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Reduces cooldown by 2 seconds and cleanse an additional Curse or Ailment.

data.name: Gather Round
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Heals group members within 100 feet for 898 health.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduciton.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and heals for an additional 624 health over 6 seconds.

data.name: Pass It On
data.description: Any time you directly heal an ally affected by your Shrug It Off, you have a 33% chance to heal all allies within 25 feet for 370 health.

data.name: Sticky Feetz
data.description: For 10 seconds, all enemies within 15 feet of a spot that you select will have their Elemental resistance reduced by 240 and become snared, reducing their run speed by 60%.

data.name: Scrub Ya Gud!
data.description: Any time you use Greener 'N Cleaner on an ally, you will additionally remove one Curse or Ailment from all groupmates within 50 feet of them.

data.name: Mork's Gift
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Heals your target for 684 health.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 30% and heals the target for an additional 341 health.

data.name: Mork Favors Me!
data.description: Mork's Gift additionally heals up to two group members within 25 feet of your target for 50% of the original value.

data.name: Do Sumfin Useful
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Your target's Toughness is increased by 250 and they regain 1200 health over 10 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 15%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Healing increased by 30% and duration increased by 5 seconds.

data.name: Feelz No Pain
data.description: Heals all of your group mates within 100 feet for 2400 health over 10 seconds and decreases damage against them  to 75% for 10 seconds

data.name: Brain Bursta
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Deals 477 Elemental damage to your target.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and 2 seconds after hitting the target, they get hit an additional time for 50% of the original damage.

data.name: Life Leaka
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You deal 980 Elemental damage to your target over 15 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 30% and target receives 5% more damage.

data.name: Bunch o' Waaagh
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You concentrate on your target for up to 6 seconds, repeatedly dealing 477 Elemental damage to them as long as you maintain your concentration.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10% and additionally slow the target by 40% for as long as you are channeling.

data.name: 'Ere We Go!
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Everyone in your group within 100 feet will do an additional 187 Elemental damage on their next attack within 10 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Reduces active cooldowns of group members by 2 seconds.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Reduces active cooldowns of group members by 5 seconds. Cooldowns can only be reduced once every 5 seconds.

data.name: Big Waaagh!
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Deals 434 Elemental damage.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 30%. Your outgoing damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Ere We Goes Again
data.description: Ere We Go will now deal 225 damage, and it will now affect your allies' next 2 attacks.

data.name: Geddoff!
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Deals 287 Elemental damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and knocks them backwards.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and knockback distance increased.

data.name: Mork's Touch
data.description: All of your offensive spells gain a 25% chance to remove a Blessing from the victim. Any time that this successfully occurs, the enemy will suffer an additional 247 Elemental damage as well. Your healing output is reduced by 10%.

data.name: Gork's Barbs'
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Gork takes interest in your target, reducing all incoming heals by 50% for 10 seconds, and will deal 498 Elemental damage to anyone healing his new toy.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 20% and additionally deals damage to the target every time they are healed. Can only be damage once every second.

data.name: Hurts, Don't It?
data.description: Brain Bursta will now also reduce the victim's Toughness by 250 for 20 seconds, and they will lose 150 points of Morale as well. Your healing output is reduced by 10%.

data.name: Da Waaagh! Is Coming
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You deal 338 Elemental damage to your target and all enemies within 20 feet of them. You apply an Ailment to them, reducing their chance to disrupt attacks by 5% for 10 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and radius increased by 50%.

data.name: Fists of Gork
data.description: Deals 1800 damage and knocks down all enemy targets within 20 feet of your target for 2 seconds.

data.name: I'll Take That!
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Deals 377 Elemental damage to your target, and heals your defensive target for 150% of the damage done.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: 50% Cast Time reduction and your outgoing healing is increased by 20% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Don' Feel Nuthin
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Surrounds an ally with a magical barrier that absorbs up to 1387 damage for up to 9 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Absorb increased by 15%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Absorb increased by 30% and cooldown reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Bleed Fer' Me
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
You deal 1488 Elemental damage to your target over 24 seconds and your defensive target is healed for 150% of the damage done.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Becomes undefendable.

data.name: You'z Squishy
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have their Toughness reduced by 100 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 20% and radius increased by 50%.

data.name: Get'n Smarter
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Steals 150 Intelligence from your target while dealing 950 Elemental damage over 15 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 30% and additionally steals 150 Willpower.

data.name: Yer A Weaklin'
data.note:
Builds Gork's Waaagh!
Mork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Everyone within 20 feet of your target will have their Strength, Intelligence and Ballistic Skill reduced by 100 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Mork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 20% and increase the Strength, Ballistic Skill and Intelligence of group members within 100 feet by 100 for 20 seconds.

data.name: Waaagh! Frenzy
data.description: I'll Take That! now has a Base heal of 656 health and Bleed Fer' Me heals your friendly target for  1242 health over 24 seconds. I'll Take That! can be cast while moving, but the damage output from I'll Take That! and Bleed Fer' Me is reduced by 50%.

data.name: Scuse Me!
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
A cone of energy strikes enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away, dealing 409 Elemental damage and reducing their Elemental resistance by 240 for 20 seconds.

1-4 Gork' Waaagh!: Damage increased by 15%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Damage increased by 30% and Strikethrough increased by 10%.

data.name: You Really Got Nuthin
data.description: Reduces You Got Nuthin's cooldown time by 10 seconds and deals an additional 390 Elemental damage over 5 seconds.

data.name: You Got Nuthin!
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
Deals 396 Elemental damage and silences your target, making them unable to use magic for 5 seconds.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: Strikethrough increased by 10%.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Becomes undefendable.

data.name: Nuthin' But Da WAAAGH!
data.description:
Don' Feel Nuthin will also cause your target to deal 15% more damage as long as the barrier is protecting them. This effect will linger for 5 seconds after the barrier is removed.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Fury of Da Green
data.note:
Builds Mork's Waaagh!
Gork's Waaagh! increases effectiveness.
data.description:
A surge of Waaaagh explodes from your target and damages up to 4 enemies within 20 feet of them, dealing 274 Elemental damage to each, and healing your defensive target and allies within 20 feet of them for 886 health, plus 50% of the total inflicted damage. When casting this ability, you will focus your power into ensuring a hit rather than for maximum damage, causing it to be 20% less likely to be Blocked or Disrupted.

1-4 Gork's Waaagh!: 25% Cast Time reduction.
5 Gork's Waaagh!: Instant cast.

data.name: Revenge of Da Green
data.description: For the next 10 seconds anytime any group member within 100 feet is attacked, they are healed for 300 health and the attacker loses 300 morale. This effect can only occur once per second per ally. Enemies can only lose morale once every second.
